modern.comment: REQUIREMENT: Modern profile design with card-based layout. REQUIREMENT: Support for dark and light themes.

professional.comment: REQUIREMENT: Dashboard must support multiple data visualization charts. REQUIREMENT: Include real-time notifications panel.

modern.comment: REQUIREMENT: Dashboard must be responsive across all devices. REQUIREMENT: Display key metrics and data visualizations. REQUIREMENT: Support real-time data updates.

accessible.comment: REQUIREMENT: Settings must be organized in logical categories. REQUIREMENT: Changes must be saved automatically or with clear save action. REQUIREMENT: Support import/export of configuration.

professional.comment: REQUIREMENT: Page must load within 3 seconds. REQUIREMENT: Implement proper error handling and user feedback. REQUIREMENT: Ensure accessibility compliance (WCAG 2.1 AA).
REQUIREMENT: Page must load within 3 seconds. REQUIREMENT: Implement proper error handling and user feedback. REQUIREMENT: Ensure accessibility compliance (WCAG 2.1 AA).

accessible.comment: REQUIREMENT: Profile page must display user information clearly. REQUIREMENT: Support profile editing with validation. REQUIREMENT: Implement privacy controls for sensitive data.
REQUIREMENT: Profile page must display user information clearly. REQUIREMENT: Support profile editing with validation. REQUIREMENT: Implement privacy controls for sensitive data.

professional.comment: REQUIREMENT: Page must load within 3 seconds. REQUIREMENT: Implement proper error handling and user feedback. REQUIREMENT: Ensure accessibility compliance (WCAG 2.1 AA).

modern.comment: REQUIREMENT: Dashboard must be responsive across all devices. REQUIREMENT: Display key metrics and data visualizations. REQUIREMENT: Support real-time data updates.

creative.comment: REQUIREMENT: Navigation must be consistent across all pages. REQUIREMENT: Support keyboard navigation for accessibility. REQUIREMENT: Implement breadcrumb trail for deep navigation.
